metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1027 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The version checking subroutine in percona-toolkit before 2.2.13 and xtrabackup before 2.2.9 was vulnerable to silent HTTP downgrade attacks and Man In The Middle attacks in which the server response could be modified to allow the attacker to respond with modified command payload and have the client return additional running configuration information leading to an information disclosure of running configuration of MySQL.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> Debian notes this version check is disabled, it may be disabled in our packages too

criterions.comment: percona-toolkit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
percona-xtrabackup: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
